Jx.Field.File

Extends: Jx.Field

This class is designed to work with an iFrame and APC upload progress.  APC is a php specific technology but any server side implementation that works in the same manner should work.  You can then wire this class to the progress bar class to show progress.

The other option is to not use progress tracking and just use the base upload which works through a hidden iFrame.  In order to use this with Jx.Form you’ll need to add it normally but keep a reference to it.  When you call Jx.Form.getValues() it will not return any file information.  You can then call the Jx.Field.File.upload() method for each file input directly and then submit the rest of the form via ajax.

MooTools.lang Keys

  • file.browseLabel

Summary
Jx.Field.FileExtends: Jx.Field
Options
templateThe template used to render the field
autoUploadWhether to upload the file immediatelly upon selection
ProgressWhether to use the APC, or similar, progress method.
progressIDUrlThe url to call in order to get the ID, or key, to use with the APC upload process
progressNameThe name to give the field that holds the generated progress ID retrieved from the server.
progressIdThe id to give the form element that holds the generated progress ID retrieved from the server.
handlerUrlThe url to send the file to.
progressUrlThe url used to retrieve the upload prgress of the file.
debugDefaults to false.
modedetermines whether this file field acts in single upload mode or multiple file upload mode.
Functions
renderrenders the file input
uploadSingleCall this to upload the file to the server
removeRemoves a file from the hash of forms to upload.
changeTextThis method should be overridden by subclasses.
getFileInputsUsed to get an array of all of the basic file inputs.

Options

template

The template used to render the field

autoUpload

Whether to upload the file immediatelly upon selection

Progress

Whether to use the APC, or similar, progress method.

progressIDUrl

The url to call in order to get the ID, or key, to use with the APC upload process

progressName

The name to give the field that holds the generated progress ID retrieved from the server.  Defaults to ‘APC_UPLOAD_PROGRESS’ which is the default for APC.

progressId

The id to give the form element that holds the generated progress ID retrieved from the server.  Defaults to ‘progress_key’.

handlerUrl

The url to send the file to.

progressUrl

The url used to retrieve the upload prgress of the file.

debug

Defaults to false.  If set to true it will prevent the hidden form and IFrame from being destroyed at the end of the upload so it can be inspected during development

mode

determines whether this file field acts in single upload mode or multiple file upload mode.  The multiple upload mode was done to work with Jx.Panel.FileUpload.  When in multiple mode, this field will remove the actual file control after a file is selected, fires an event to signify the selection but will hold on to the files until told to upload them.  Obviously ‘multiple’ mode isn’t designed to be used when the control is outside of the Upload Panel (unless the user designs their own upload panel around it).

Functions

render

render: function ()

renders the file input

uploadSingle

uploadSingle: function (form)

Call this to upload the file to the server

remove

remove: function (filename)

Removes a file from the hash of forms to upload.

Parameters

filenamethe filename indicating which file to remove.

changeText

changeText: function (lang)

This method should be overridden by subclasses.  It should be used to change any language specific default text that is used by the widget.

Parameters

langthe language being changed to or that had it’s data set of translations changed.

getFileInputs

getFileInputs: function ()

Used to get an array of all of the basic file inputs.  This is mainly here for use by Jx.Form to be able to suck in the file inputs before a standard submit.
